configuration_schema.description: The configuration information of Ethernet loop detect.

eld.description: The configuration information of Ethernet loop detect.

period.description: The transmission period of the detection packets.

detect-policy.description: The processing strategy for loop point.

policy.description: The processing strategy for loop point.

block.description: The block processing mode of loop point. When a loop point occurs, port data streams are isolated.

block-policy.description: The block processing mode of loop point. When a loop point occurs, port data streams are isolated.

diagnosis-time.description: The continuous isolated time of data stream on the loop point.

normal.description: The normal processing mode of loop point. When a loop point occurs, port data streams are not isolated.

normal-policy.description: The normal processing mode of loop point. When a loop point occurs, port data streams are not isolated.

protect.description: When a loop point occurs, port data streams are isolated and the port physical status will be set to down.

protect-policy.description: When a loop point occurs, port data streams are isolated and the port physical status will be set to down.

protect-diag-time.description: The continuous isolated time of data stream on the loop point.

detect-policy.description: The processing strategy for loop point.

policy.description: The processing strategy for loop point.

block.description: Interface block policy. If the port is a loop point,data streams are isolated.
